about_the_game:
The further you go, the scarier your surroundings become

Story


Ever since Michael lost his wife and daughter in a tragic car accident, his life's turned into a nightmare. Tormented by guilt for their death, Michael suffers from depression and insomnia. Terrifying visions of creatures with long arms silently standing in shadows are following him. A phone call from mysterious Dr. Thaler claiming to help Michael changes everything. Michael discovers the horrifying truth and the way to turn things around...

Features


Candle flame can save your life. Collect candles appearing on your way. It will be your only weapon against the Faceless.

-
When enemies come, keep your speed balanced. Don't run too fast. Otherwise, candle flame will go down, and you'll lose your only weapon. Don't walk too slow, or the Faceless will catch you up. Keep away from turning your back on them.

-
While a candle's burning, its flame's dying. Use it only when the worst comes.



Soul pieces store Michael's memories. Find the pieces and revive your memories. When the time comes, these can help to make the right choice.



Look for notes. You may find a bunch of tips inside them on how to survive in this world.

About gameplay

  • The game will take around six hours.
  • The game features four endings available. Pay close attention to details, learn about traits and relationships of characters, and unlock the best possible ending. You will enjoy all this during the gameplay.
